title: President Rajapaksa addresses the nation tomorrow
body_lines: President Gotabaya Rajapaksa will address the nation at 8.30 p.m. on Wednesday (March 16), the President’s Media Division.
The Head of State is expected to speak regarding the prevailing situation in the country.
Tune into TV Derana or Ada Derana 24 to watch the live telecast of the President’s address to the nation.
